description: In regular morning meeting, the president broaches that the company goes bankrupt today. It plunges the employees into despair and confusion. One of the female employees, Nishizaki summons a chief manager at hot-water service room to tell her love to him. They soon begins have sex there, but other men at the office appears when the two are in the middle of sex! It becomes a large sex party!
name: Nishizaki
